thumb.title: 魁!!男塾 Request
thumb.description: I was asked by a friend to make this. "Fuck you."I don't know what half of the buttons on this website even mean or do because I am a gaijin, so please excuse the disorderly appearance of this video.I want to write something to you using Google Translate, but I don't know if I'm being rude. So, instead, I write "I want to write something to you using Google Translate, but I don't know if I'm going to be rude." Yes, I deliberately repeated the last part.
